channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Limit Login Attempts Reloaded
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Limit Login Attempts Reloaded

item.title: CVE-2023-5525|2023-11-27T16:22:06.971Z -- unknown -- limit%20login%20attempts%20reloaded
item.description: The Limit Login Attempts Reloaded WordPress plugin before 2.25.26 is missing authorization on the `toggle_auto_update` AJAX action, allowing any user with a valid nonce to toggle the auto-update status of the plugin.
